hero.title: Join Our
hero.description: Build your career with a leader in precision manufacturing. We're looking for talented individuals who share our commitment to excellence, innovation, and quality.

whyWorkHere.heading: Why Work at IIS?
whyWorkHere.paragraph1: Since 1995, Integrated Inspection Systems has been a trusted leader in precision manufacturing for aerospace, defense, and advanced industries. We're proud of our 30-year legacy of quality, innovation, and team excellence.
whyWorkHere.paragraph2: Our team of 150+ skilled professionals works in a state-of-the-art facility using cutting-edge technology including 5-axis CNC machining, adaptive manufacturing, and advanced metrology. We maintain AS9100D, ISO 9001:2015, ITAR registration, and CMMC compliance—standards that reflect our commitment to excellence.
whyWorkHere.paragraph3: We're looking for engineers, technicians, machinists, and quality professionals who want to make a real impact in precision manufacturing.

benefits.heading: Benefits & Opportunities
benefits.description: We invest in our team because our people are our greatest asset

items.title: Collaborative Culture
items.description: Work with talented engineers and technicians who share your passion for precision manufacturing excellence

items.title: Professional Development
items.description: Access to continuous training, certifications, and opportunities to advance your career in precision manufacturing

items.title: Comprehensive Benefits
items.description: Competitive health insurance, 401(k) matching, paid time off, and a commitment to work-life balance

items.title: Industry Leadership
items.description: Be part of a company at the forefront of aerospace and defense precision manufacturing technology

values.heading: Our Core Values
values.description: These principles guide how we work, innovate, and collaborate

items.title: Excellence
items.description: We demand the highest standards in everything we do—from components to customer service

items.title: Innovation
items.description: We invest in cutting-edge technology and encourage our team to think creatively

items.title: Integrity
items.description: We operate with transparency and honesty in all our business relationships

items.title: Teamwork
items.description: Success comes from collaboration and mutual respect across all departments

opportunities.heading: Current Opportunities
opportunities.description: We're growing and actively hiring talented professionals. Don't see your ideal position? Let us know—we're always interested in exceptional talent.

positions.title: Manufacturing Engineering
positions.description: Work on advanced manufacturing processes, 5-axis CNC programming, and process optimization for aerospace components

positions.title: Quality Engineer
positions.description: Ensure quality excellence through CMM inspection, GD&T analysis, and first article inspection on aerospace projects

positions.title: CNC Machinist
positions.description: Operate and optimize 5-axis CNC machines producing precision aerospace components. Requires AS9100 experience.

cta.description: Whether you see an open position or want to let us know about your interest, we'd love to hear from you.
